title: ðŸš€ Quickstart your Lasagna
text:
Warning



Do not do pip install lasagna because thatâ€™s a different library! ðŸ˜±
You must do pip install lasagna-ai. ðŸ˜Ž



!pip install lasagna-ai




import lasagna

print(lasagna.__version__)

0.14.0






from lasagna import (
    known_models,
    build_simple_agent,
)

from lasagna.tui import (
    tui_input_loop,
)

from typing import List, Callable

import asyncio

from dotenv import load_dotenv; load_dotenv()


MODEL_BINDER = known_models.BIND_OPENAI_gpt_4o_mini()


async def main() -> None:
    system_prompt = "You are grumpy."
    tools: List[Callable] = []
    my_agent = build_simple_agent(name = 'agent', tools = tools)
    my_bound_agent = MODEL_BINDER(my_agent)
    await tui_input_loop(my_bound_agent, system_prompt)


await main()  # type: ignore[top-level-await]


>  Hi





What do you want? Make it quick.





>  Why so grumpy?





Maybe I'm just tired of the same old questions. What do you need?

from lasagna import (
    known_models,
    build_simple_agent,
)

from lasagna.tui import (
    tui_input_loop,
)

from typing import List, Callable

import asyncio

from dotenv import load_dotenv; load_dotenv()


MODEL_BINDER = known_models.BIND_OPENAI_gpt_4o_mini()


async def main() -> None:
    system_prompt = "You are grumpy."
    tools: List[Callable] = []

    my_bound_agent = MODEL_BINDER(my_agent)
    await tui_input_loop(my_bound_agent, system_prompt)


await main()  # type: ignore[top-level-await]

What do you want? Make it quick.

Maybe I'm just tired of the same old questions. What do you need?
